title: New editorial explores double-edged sword of AI scribes in health care
description: A new editorial published in JMIR Medical Informatics examines the rapid rise of ambient artificial intelligence (AI) scribes—technologies designed to automate clinical documentation and ease the administrative burden on health care practitioners. While these tools show great promise in reducing burnout and freeing up time for patient care, the editorial highlights significant concerns that warrant further investigation.
content:
This article has been reviewed according to Science X's editorial process and policies . Editors have highlighted the following attributes while ensuring the content's credibility:

title: New Michigan laws ban AI-generated pornography
description: It's now illegal in Michigan to create images via artificial intelligence that falsely portrays a specific person in sexual activity or situations.
content:
It's now illegal in Michigan to create images via artificial intelligence that falsely portray a specific person in sexual activity or situations.

title: Samsung Ushers In The AI Phone Era: A Leap Forward in Device Interaction
description: Samsung is spearheading the transition from smartphones to 'AI Phones,' integrating artificial intelligence to enhance user interaction. The Galaxy AI platform facilitates features like real-time translation and personalized AI technology. Despite challenges with power and performance, Samsung's advancements aim to revolutionize device communication.
content: Samsung is leading the charge into the 'AI Phone' era, a shift poised to transform the way users interact with their devices by harnessing artificial intelligence, according to Mohan Rao Goli, Managing Director of Samsung Research Institute-Bengaluru... [569 chars]
